title: Senate session commences to discuss Finance Bill 2025
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 19 (APP):The session of the Senate, chaired by Chairman Senate Syed Yousaf Raza Gillani, began on Thursday at 11:35 a.m. at the Parliament House.
Various committee reports are being presented in the House.
The House and continue the ongoing debate on the Finance Bill, 2025.
The discussion stems from a motion moved by Minister for Finance and Revenue Senator Muhammad Aurangzeb on June 10, seeking the Senateâ€™s recommendations on the Finance Bill, including the Annual Budget Statement, in accordance with Article 73 of the Constitution. This marks the fifth day of the budget debate.
